resources.string:
Student Number: 20190018801 
 Course: BS Information Technology 
 Age: Don't Ask! 

 Hi my name is George Jose Montano. 

 I love sleep 

 The kind of sleep where we dream of more sleep. 

 I like sleeping at home in my bed where it is comfortable. 

 Sometimes I sleep at work where sneak off to snooze a bit or two. 

 Sometimes I sleep at school while the teacher teaches ones and threes. 

 Once I slept while eating and woke up drooling. 
 (Scroll down for moreâ€¦) 
 

 I enjoy Photography but don't know how to use a camera. 

 I just copy and paste images from the internet. 

 

 I like to draw people and animals. 

 But can only draw sticks and circles. 

 

 I used to cook the best pancit canton on Earth. 

 But Lucky Me changed their recipe. 

 The end.
